source: Smugglers is a fun map for 4 players. You and your partner start diagonally from each other on a point symmetric island. There are plenty of smuggling tunnels on this island, each consisting of a receiving and a sending end.
target: Smokkelers is in map foar 4 spilers. Do en dyn maat begjinne diagonaal tsjin inoar oer op in symmetrysk eilân. Dêr binne in soad smokkeltunnels op it eilând. Elts bestiet út in yngong en útgong.

source: As wood gnome you like big forests, so your task is to have more trees on your territory than any other player. The game will end after 4 hours of playing. The one with the most trees at that point will win the game.
target: As boskabouter hâldsto fan grutte bosken en dyn taak is om mear beammen op dyn grûngebiet te krijen dan dyn tsjinstanners. De striid is nei 4 oeren foarby en dyjinge dy't dan de measte beammen hat wint de striid.

source: To establish a smuggling route, you need to build a warehouse on a sending/receiving spot while your team mate has to build one on the corresponding receiving/sending spot. A ware is then transported every 10 seconds.
target: Om in smokkelrûte op te setten is it nedich datsto in pakhûs by in yn- of in útgong delsetst wylst dyn maat oan de oare ein in pakhûs hat. Alle 10 sekonden wurdt der dan wat hinne en wer ferfierd.

source: Remember that the map has rotational symmetry. For example, when you have found a spot to the top-left of your headquarters, the corresponding spot will be to the bottom-right of the headquarters of your team mate.
target: Unthâld dat de kaart rotaasjesymmetrysk is. Wannears befoarbyld in plak oan de linkerboppekant fan dyn haadkertier fûn hast wol dat sizze dat it oare byhearrende plak oan de rjochterûnderkant fan dyn maat syn haadkertier te finen is.

source: Search for ancient artifacts. Once all of them are found, the team who owns most of them will win the game.
target: Gean op syk nei iuwenâlde museumstikken. Wannear't hja allegear fûn binne komt it spultsje ta in ein en dejinge dy't de measten hat wint.

source: The tribe or team that can defeat all others wins the game!
target: De stam of it team dat alle oaren ferslaan kin wint de striid.
